reviews.review_msg: Good Prof. Notes were helpful for assignments, Exam questions built well on assignments and notes. Posted pictures of written notes for those who were unable to be in class. Very flexible with students' course load and extensions.
Pretty Good. Good notes, fair exams, I would take his class again. Has an accent but if you're Chinese or used to listening to Chinese accents, you'll be fine.

Pretty good prof.  Posted slides before class and problem sets after every class.  Midterms and final where mostly based on in class notes and practice questions.   Lots of examples in class so attendance helps understanding a ton.
